comments.raw_text:
I can't reproduce it using 52.8.0 or 60.0b6 on Linux or Windows 10.

If I understand correctly. 

I'm opening the Address Book window.
Deleting a contact from one of the address books in the Directory Pane.
Closing the Address Book window. 
Open a composition window and the first contact in the first address book will be selected when you type a letter in the To: field, no matter what that letter is.

I can only reproduce that if I type the letter a, which brings up the first entry (Ameriprise), in the first address book (Personal), along with others with that letter from all my address books.

If I type the letter c, I get addresses with that letter. Not the address for Ameriprise as the first entry. That is at the bottom of the list of addresses.
